claimsense.name: ClaimSense AI Billing Assistant
claimsense.description: Healthcare billing assistant with AI-powered claim validation and fixing

tools.name: extract_entities
tools.description: Extract structured medical entities from clinician notes. Returns entities in natural language (not billing codes).

clinician_note.description: The clinician's note text to extract entities from

tools.name: map_codes
tools.description: Map extracted entities to valid CPT and ICD-10 codes using deterministic lookup tables.

tools.name: validate_claim
tools.description: Validate a claim against CMS rules, NCCI edits, and payer policies. Returns list of validation issues.

claim.description: The claim to validate in CMS-1500 format

tools.name: fix_claim
tools.description: Generate AI-powered fixes for validation issues using GPT-4 and policy citations from Unsiloed AI.

validation_issues.description: List of validation issues to fix

tools.name: lookup_policy
tools.description: Query Unsiloed AI for payer policy information and CMS rule citations.

query.description: The policy question or rule to look up

tools.name: submit_claim
tools.description: Submit claim to mock payer for approval/denial decision.

tools.name: log_action
tools.description: Log an action to the audit trail for compliance and debugging.

action.description: Description of the action being logged

claim_id.description: Optional claim ID associated with this action
